title: LF P1+ Junglers, Top laners and mids* for competitive team.
body:
Looking for Platinum 1 or higher Junglers and top laners for a competitive team which will undergo trials soon. I will be managing the team and make sure to add me (Split Pushen) if you are interested. Although I will consider players < Plat1 but realise that your chances aren't as high. Competitive experience prioritised but not mandatory.

* If you are a mid laner LFT and are p1+ you can add me and trial for the main positition although nothing guaranteed, sub positions for all roles open.

replies.body:
Keen to try for the mid lane role! :D 
{{champion:55}}
Lol we literally main the same champs XD
I’m also keen for mid although I’m plat 4 but I can try right?
